entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
